#summary Main Page

= Introduction =

This project is an implemention of a Discrete Level Of Detail Algorithm, as found on www.gamasutra.com, by Chris Dallaire, entitled "Binary Triangle Trees for Terrain Tile Index Buffer Generation".

Currently supports only _very_ limited shading..


= Other Information =
